options.optionText: You gonna be okay after that? You look like you ran a marathon.
options.responseText: Mmm, honey, I feel like I ran one... in heels... uphill. But don’t worry, I’ve got plenty left in the tank ♥.

followUpOptions.optionText: Plenty left? You sure you’re not about to pass out?
followUpOptions.responseText: Pass out? Please. This body’s got more stamina than a Vault-Tec generator. It’s you who’s about to need a nap.

options.responseText: Leaving already? You didn’t even stay long enough to give me a cigarette, sweetheart ♥. But I’ll be sure to keep you in my thoughts...
